snippet: The assignment to depict Nik Wallenda’s plan to cross Niagara Falls on a tightrope drew many lovely submissions. There’s still time to send more.
abstract: The assignment to depict Nik Wallenda’s plan to cross Niagara Falls on a tightrope drew many lovely submissions. There’s still time to send more.

headline.main: Kids Draw the News | Nik Wallenda's Big Night
